entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location mentioned as a place where Harry went on a trip. ("Last Hogsmeade weekend")

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts school that lost 50 points due to Harry's actions. ("Fifty points from Gryffindor")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the person who was caught with The Quibbler magazine and got in trouble. ("There will be no more Hogsmead e trips for you, Mr. Potter")

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is a magazine that Harry was caught with and got in trouble for having. ("Any student found in possession of the magazine The Quibbler will be expelled")

entities.name: the high inquisitor of hogwarts
entities.description: The High Inquisitor of Hogwarts is a position that issued the order to expel students caught with The Quibbler. ("—   by order of  —  The High Inquisitor of Hogwarts")

relationships.description: Harry Potter was caught with The Quibbler magazine. ("Any student found in possession of the magazine The Quibbler will be expelled")
Gryffindor house lost 50 points due to Harry's actions. ("Fifty points from Gryffindor")
